DOC.brief_summary: The Purpose of this trial is: - to determine the overall response rate (ORR, complete response [CR] + partial response [PR]) in patients with relapsed or refractory HL - to determine the safety profile of ruxolitinib in patients with relapsed or refractory HL
DOC.brief_title: JAK-inhibition in Recurrent Classical Hodgkin Lymphoma
